lead_paragraph: The facility, which will be patrolled by 85,000 police officers and soldiers, includes mosquito-repelling apparatus aimed at preventing the spread of the Zika virus.

headline.print_headline: Building a Village for Athletes, Not Mosquitoes, That’s Spartan but Secure
headline.main: An Olympic Village for Athletes, Not Mosquitoes, That’s Spartan but Secure

snippet: The facility, which will be patrolled by 85,000 police officers and soldiers, includes mosquito-repelling apparatus aimed at preventing the spread of the Zika virus.
